name: .CON File Extension
summary: Learn about .CON files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Battlefield 1942, a World War II first-person shooter game; saved in plain text and contains configuration information for the game, including video and input control settings; often used for fine-tuning game "mods."

content: Common CON files include video.con, videoDefault.con, maplist.con, and maplist.con.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
